item.title: [PI] Adding Teleports through NPC's? [1m RSGP Reward]
item.dc:creator: @TimeBroken TimeBroken
item.description:
@TimeBroken wrote:

Offering 1m RSGP to whoever gets it working.

Does anyone know how I would make an NPC teleport you? I want it to say this:

Hello, would you like to go to blah?

Yes.
No.

If you click yes, boom, it teleports you. If you click No, then it exits the dialogue.

Here’s what I have so far from another friend giving me slight help:

case 20:
			sendOption2("Yes", "No");
			c.dialogueAction = 100;
			break;
case idnumber:
				if (c.dialogueAction == 100) {
					c.getPA().startTeleport(2559,3089,0,"modern");
					c.sendMessage("You teleport to SafePK");
					}

Anyone know how to make it say/do what I need?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Adding Teleports through NPC's? [1m RSGP Reward]
